sentences.sContent: Negotiators from the three countries finalized the agreement in August.
sentences.sCn: 3个国家的谈判代表在8月最终确定了协议。

sentences.sContent: We are saying nothing until all the details have been finalized.
sentences.sCn: 在所有细节最终确定之前我们无可奉告。

words.tran: 最终的；决定性的；不可更改的
决赛；期末考试；当日报纸的末版
结局；终曲；最后一场；最后乐章；尾声
定局；终结；结尾；最后的事物；最后的言行

trans.tranCn: 完成， 结束； 最终确定
trans.tranOther: If you finalize something such as a plan or an agreement, you complete the arrangements for it, especially by discussing it with other people
